expectedQuestions.summary: What specific metrics should be displayed on the dashboard?
expectedQuestions.description:
The story mentions 'data and metrics' but doesn't specify:
* Which KPIs are most important?
* What business metrics are needed?
* Should metrics be user-specific or org-wide?

expectedQuestions.summary: Which user roles can access the dashboard?
expectedQuestions.description:
Please clarify:
* Is this for all users or specific roles?
* Are there different views for different roles?
* What are the permission requirements?

expectedQuestions.summary: What time periods should the analytics cover?
expectedQuestions.description:
The requirements don't specify:
* Last 24 hours, 7 days, 30 days, custom range?
* Should users be able to select time periods?
* Is historical data needed?

expectedQuestions.summary: What types of charts and graphs are preferred?
expectedQuestions.description:
Please specify:
* Line charts, bar charts, pie charts, tables?
* Are there design mockups available?
* Should charts be interactive?

The story mentions 'fast' but doesn't quantify:
* What is the target load time?
* How many concurrent users?
* Should data be cached?

Should users be able to:
* Export data to Excel/CSV?
* Schedule automated reports?
* Share dashboard views with others?

description: File upload with vague validation requirements

expectedQuestions.summary: What is the maximum file size per upload?
expectedQuestions.description:
File size limits need to be specified:
* Maximum size per file?
* Maximum total storage per user?
* Should there be different limits for different file types?

expectedQuestions.summary: What specific image/document/video formats are supported?
expectedQuestions.description:
Please list exact formats:
* Images: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, SVG, TIFF?
* Documents: PDF, DOCX, TXT, XLSX, PPTX?
* Videos: MP4, AVI, MOV, MKV, WebM?

Validation requirements unclear:
* Virus/malware scanning?
* File type validation (magic numbers vs extension)?
* Content validation (e.g., image contains inappropriate content)?
* File name restrictions?

expectedQuestions.summary: Where and how should files be stored?
expectedQuestions.description:
Storage architecture needs clarification:
* Cloud storage (S3, Azure Blob, Google Cloud Storage)?
* Local filesystem?
* CDN for delivery?
* Backup and redundancy requirements?

expectedQuestions.summary: What is the file retention policy?
expectedQuestions.description:
Please specify:
* How long should files be kept?
* Should deleted files be recoverable?
* Are there compliance requirements (GDPR, HIPAA)?

expectedQuestions.summary: Should there be account lockout after failed login attempts?
expectedQuestions.description:
Security consideration not mentioned:
* How many failed attempts before lockout?
* How long should lockout last?
* Should there be CAPTCHA after X attempts?

note: This ticket has clear requirements, so only 0-2 questions expected
